name: The Witcher 2 Game Archive
summary: Learn about .DZIP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: DZIP files are also used for storing downloadable content (DLC) for The Witcher 2.

description: File used by The Witcher 2: Assassins of Kings, a third person role-playing game; used as a container format for game content and may store various types of data, including models, textures, sounds, and other game data.
